column5: I fished a couple of small local lakes with my brother the last 2 days. The weather was beutiful, around 0 degrees, light winds, mix of sun and clouds. Cant ask for much better in December.Cought a real mix of fish wich made for a fun couple of days and a nice meal today. 9 pike 1-3 lbs, a bunch of crappies up to 13.5'', a few pumpkinseeds up to 10'', lots of small perch, a largemouth and a bullhead.  heres some pics.
Nice report and a mixed bag of fish.  Regards, Sam
Looks like a great day, congrats.
Nice mix of fish looks like you will be haven a great dinner  rob
Good fishin'Danimal  I didn't know that one was open yet, how was the ice?  Lots of people?  Burt
At least 6'' of solid ice and about 5 or 6 small groups of people out there.
wow what a variety!  My ice fishing involves pike, pike and more pike.  You've got more variety in a day than I get in a season
Those are some big donkey crappies!  Nice shootin'!
Mixed haul for sure, good stuff...
Nice fish, those crappies are a great size.  Thanks for the report.
